name: Pizza Rat II: Lost in New York
name_original: Pizza Rat II: Lost in New York
description:
You dirty rat!

You’ve lost your way in NYC. Luckily you’ve found some semi-cooperative, anti-gravity, leftover pizza to help you get back home.

Features pizza, gravity, and rats

Made for the Rat (Bitsy Jam) with  @bitsy/hecks
